net.smartsocket
Class Logger

java.lang.Object
  net.smartsocket.Logger

public class Logger
extends java.lang.Object

The Logger class handles all of the displaying of log text to the console gui in the correct tabs. The class works on a level based system, in which only the levels which meet or exceed the minimum log level are output to the gui console.

Author:
XaeroDegreaz

Field Summary
static int CRITICAL
          The highest level of logging so far.
static int DEBUG
          This is the default level used for any log call that doesn't have an explicit log level defined

          This is a level above the debug level
